1: Are wa' ri cajilabal ri aj israelib ri xebalax pa Juda, ri xec'am bic pa Babilon rumal ri ajawinel Nabucodonosor, aretak e c'amtajinak chi bic pa Babilon xetzelej chi c'u pa Jerusalen xukuje' pa jujun tak c'olbal chic re Juda, chquijujunal xetzelej pa ri qui tinimit,
2: c'amom qui be rumal ri Zorobabel, ri Jexu, ri Nehemiy, ri Seraiy, ri Reelaiy, ri Mardoquey, ri Bilsan, ri Mispar, ri Bigbay, ri Rehum, xukuje' ri Baan:
3: Ri e rija'lil ri Pars, e quieb mil jun sient ruc' oxc'al cablajuj (2,172);
4: ri e re ri Sepatiy, e oxib sient oxc'al cablajuj (372);
5: ri e re ri Ar, e wukub sient oxc'al olajuj (775);
6: ri e re ri Pahat-moab, o ri e re ri Jexu xukuje' ri Joab, e quieb mil wajxakib sient cablajuj (2,812);
7: ri e re ri Elam, e jun mil quieb sient ruc' cawinak cajlajuj (1,254);
8: ri e re ri Zat, e belejeb sient ruc' cawinak job (945);
9: ri e re ri Zacay, e wukub sient oxc'al (760);
10: ri e re ri Binuy, e wakib sient cawinak quieb (642);
11: ri e re ri Bebay, wakib sient juwinak oxib (623);
12: ri e re ri Azgad, e jun mil quieb sient juwinak quieb (1,222);
13: ri e re ri Adonicam, e wakib sient oxc'al wakib (666);
14: ri e re ri Bigbay, e quieb mil ruc' cawinak waklajuj (2,056);
15: ri e re ri Adin, e quiejeb sient ruc' cawinak cajlajuj (454);
16: ri e re ri Ater, o ri e re Ezequiy, e jumuch' wajxaklajuj (98);
17: ri e re ri Besay, e oxib sient juwinak oxib (323);
18: ri e re ri Jor, e jun sient cablajuj (112);
19: ri e re ri Hasum, e quieb sient juwinak oxib (223);
20: ri e re ri Jibar, e jumuch' olajuj (95);
21: ri e re ri Belen, e jun sient juwinak oxib (123);
22: ri e rachijab re ri Netop, e cawinak waklajuj (56);
23: ri e re ri Anatot, e jun sient juwinak wajxakib (128).
24: Ri e rija'lil ri Bet-asmabet, e cawinak quieb (42);
25: ri e que ri Quiriat-jearim, ri Capir xukuje' ri Beerot, e wukub sient cawinak oxib (743);
26: ri e que ri Rama xukuje' ri Jeb e wakib sient juwinak jun (621).
27: Ri rachijab re ri Micmas, e jun sient juwinak quieb (122);
28: ri e que ri Betel xukuje' ri Hai, e quieb sient juwinak oxib (223);
29: ri e rija'lil ri Neb, e cawinak cablajuj (52);
30: ri e re ri Magbis, e jun sient cawinak waklajuj (156);
31: ri e re ri jun Elam chic, e jun mil quieb sient cawinak cajlajuj (1,254);
32: ri e re ri Harim, e oxib sient juwinak (320);
33: ri e que ri Lod, Hadid xukuje' ri On, e wukub sient juwinak job (725);
34: ri e re ri Jerico, e oxib sient cawinak job (345);
35: ri e re ri Sena, e oxib mil wakib sient juwinak lajuj (3,630).
36: Ri e cojol tabal tok'ob ri e rija'lil ri Jedaiy, ri e rachalaxic ri Jexu, e belejeb sient oxc'al oxlajuj (973);
37: ri e re ri Imer, e jun mil ruc' cawinak cablajuj (1,052);
38: ri e re ri Pasur, e jun mil quieb sient ruc' cawinak wukub (1,247);
39: ri e re ri Harim, e jun mil wuklajuj (1,017).
40: Ri e aj Levi ri e rija'lil ri Jexu xukuje' ri e re ri Cadmiel, ri xukuje' e rija'lil c'ut ri Hodabiy, e oxc'al cajlajuj (74).
41: Ri aj bixab, ri e rija'lil ri Asap, e jun sient juwinak wajxakib (128).
42: Ri e chajil tak u chi' ri tinimit: e are' ri rija'lil ri Salum, ri e re ri Ater, ri e re ri Talmon, ri e re ri Acub, ri e re ri Hatit ri e re ri Sobay. Chnimalaj conojel, e jun sient juwinak belejlajuj (139).
43: Ri e pataninelab canok chupam ri Rachoch Dios e are' ri e rija'lil ri Ziha, ri e re ri Hasup, ri e re ri Tabaot,
44: ri e re ri Queros, ri e re Sia, ri e re ri Padon,
45: ri e re ri Leban, ri e re ri Hagaba, ri e re ri Acub,
46: ri e re Hagab, ri e re ri Salmay, ri e re ri Hanan,
47: ri e re ri Jidel, ri e re ri Gahar, ri e re ri Reaiy,
48: ri e re ri Rezin, ri e re ri Necod, ri e re ri Gazam,
49: ri e re ri Uza, ri e re ri Pasey, ri e re ri Besay,
50: ri e re ri Asen, ri e re ri Meunim, ri e re ri Nepusim,
51: ri e re ri Bacbuc, ri e re ri Hacup, ri e re ri Harur, ri e re ri Bazlut,
52: ri e re ri Mehid, ri e re ri Hars,
53: ri e re ri Barcs, ri e re ri Sisara, ri e re ri Tem,
54: ri e re ri Nesiy, xukuje' ri e re ri Hatip.
55: Ri e quija'lil ri e pataninel tak re can ri Salomon e are' ri e rija'lil ri Sotay, ri e re ri Soperet, ri e re ri Perud,
56: ri e re ri Jaal, ri e re ri Darcon, ri e re ri Jidel,
57: ri e re ri Sepatiy, ri e re ri Hatil, ri e re ri Poqueret-asebaim xukuje' ri e re ri Amon.
58: Ri cajilabal ri quepatanin can pa ri Rachoch Dios chi nimalaj conojel xukuje' ri e quech ri e u pataninelab can ri Salomon oxib sient jumuch' cablajuj (392).
59: Ri e aj Tel-mel, ri e aj Tel-ars, ri e aj Querub, ri e aj Adon xukuje' ri e aj Imer, ri xebopanic ri man xecuin taj xquik'alajisaj e jachin tak ri e qui mam mawi ri quija'lil we kas aj israelib, e are' tak wa':
60: Ri e rija'lil ri Delaiy, ri e re ri Tobiy xukuje' ri e re ri Necod, e wakib sient cawinak cablajuj (652).
61: Chque c'ut ri u k'ab cachalaxic ri e cojol tabal tok'ob: ri e rija'lil ri Habaiy, ri e re ri Cos xukuje' ri e re ri Barzilay, ri xc'uli' ruc' jun chque ri e u mia'l ri Barzilay, ri aj Galaad, ri xuc'am c'ut ri qui bi' wa'.
62: Xtzucux ri qui bi' wa' chquixo'l ri qui bi' ri cachalaxic, man c'u xeriktaj ta chi', xebelesax c'u chquixo'l ri e cojol tabal tok'ob.
63: Xuya' c'u ne takanic ri k'atal tzij chque chi maquitij que ri tzukbalib ri e tastalic c'ä jun cojol tabal tok'ob cuya' na u bixic ri cubij ri Urim xukuje' ri Tumim.
64: Chi nimalaj conojel we winak ri' xemolotaj cawinak quieb mil oxib sient oxc'al winak (42,360).
65: Man xebajilax ta c'ut ri e qui lok'om pataninelab, achijab xukuje' ixokib, ri e wukub mil oxib sient juwinak wuklajuj (7,337) winak. E c'o xukuje' quieb sient (200) aj bixab achijab xukuje' ixokib.
66: E c'o xukuje' wukub sient juwinak waklajuj (736) qui quiej, quieb sient cawinak job (245) qui mulayib,
67: quiejeb sient juwinak olajuj (435) camey xukuje' wakib mil wukub sient juwinak (6,720) qui bur.
68: Jujun tak c'ämal qui be jujun tak ja winak, aretak xebopan pa ri Rachoch ri Ajawaxel pa Jerusalen, xequijach tak sipanic che u banic u yaquic ri Rachoch ri Dios pa ri u c'olbal.
69: Xequiya' c'u ri qui cuchuj che ri u banic u yaquic, jas ri xecuin che u ya'ic, lajuj (10) quintal ruc' oxib arob k'an puak, oxc'al (60) quintal ruc' quieb arob sak puak, xukuje' jun sient u pam catz'iak ri e cojol tabal tok'ob.
70: Ri e cojol tabal tok'ob, ri aj levitib xukuje' jujun chque ri winak ri xejeki' can pa Jerusalen, e are tak c'ut ri ajbixab, chajil tak oquibal xukuje' ri quepatanij chupam ri Rachoch Dios, xukuje' ri niq'uiaj aj israelib chic, xecanaj can chquipam ri kas e qui tinimit.
